title: Hour 2: Tom vs. Time vs. Aaron Rodgers?
description:
Domonique Foxworth and Chris "Mad Dog" Russo return to share their takes on if Donovan Mitchell would be the biggest sports star in The Big Apple if Utah deals him to the Knicks. Plus, it's all eyes on Tiger in Round 2 of The Open Championship and the guys make their predictions on whether or not he'll make the cut. As Tom Brady's 45th birthday looms, the crew debates how long he'll keep playing and the chances that Aaron Rodgers will call it a career before him. Also, in the wake of Lamar Jackson's recent Twitter clapbacks, Domonique and Mad Dog argue if he's the most unfairly criticized athlete in sports today. Brian Windhorst is back to talk about the NBA's load management issue. Mad Dog gives us his all-time top 5 NFL uniforms, but does he have them right? And, the crew decides which event is more exciting: the Home Run Derby or the Slam Dunk Contest.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: What are the chances Aaron Rodgers retires before Tom Brady?
